subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jamal Crawford scored 32 points, connecting on 7 of his 9 3-pointers and Zach Randolph added 25 points and 14 rebounds for the Knicks’ third straight win.
snippet: Jamal Crawford scored 32 points, connecting on 7 of his 9 3-pointers and Zach Randolph added 25 points and 14 rebounds for the Knicks’ third straight win.
